posts.title: Building My Portfolio Website
posts.content: Today I worked on adding a blog feature to my portfolio website. It's exciting to see how simple it can be to add dynamic content using just JSON and JavaScript. The blog section will help me share my daily learnings and experiences with everyone who visits my site.

posts.title: Welcome to My Blog
posts.content: This is my first blog post! I'll be sharing my thoughts, experiences, and updates here regularly.
